headline: Are Tapestry Shares a Bargain After 138% Rally Amid Acquisition Buzz?
summary: Wondering if Tapestry is actually a bargain right now? You are not alone. There is more to the story than meets the eye. The stock has delivered a 138.1% return over the last year, outpacing many of its peers, despite a recent dip of 4.3% in the past week. Tapestry’s price surge has been driven by speculation over luxury sector demand and news of shifting consumer trends. Analysts and investors have weighed in on its potential market advantage. Most recently, discussions around brand...
